item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: This policy applies to all information collected or submitted on Kamaal’s apps for iPhone, iPad and Mac. This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service. If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that I collect is used for providing and improving the Service.

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you have any questions or suggestions about my app, do not hesitate to contact me at app.kamaal@gmail.com.
